message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds immense value for you at $1000000. I understand its significance and would like to offer it to you at a special price, reflecting its true worth. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product offers, I propose a price of $950000. This is an opportunity not only to secure a remarkable asset but also to benefit from a favorable transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
